page.title: 16RELIGION - CURDWORTH AREA
page.content: CURDWORTH PARISH CHURCH - 820 YEARS OLD. AN AVERAGE OF 50 PEOPLE ATTEND SERVICES HELD BY REV'D G. COLLINS. 47 MARRIAGES AND 35 BAPTISMS TOOK PLACE IN 1984. CHURCH ORGANISATIONS - GUIDES/BROWNIES/CUBS/SCOUTS/WOMENS GUILD AND A LUNCHEON CLUB FOR THE SENIOR CITIZENS. WATER ORTON PARISH CHURCH. REV'D S. MAYES HOLDS SERVICES IN THE 106 YEAR OLD CHURCH FOR AN AVERAGE OF 130 PEOPLE. IN 1984 THERE WERE 12 MARRIAGES AND 16 BAPTISMS. WATER ORTON METHODIST CHURCH - 117 YEARS OLD DUAL PURPOSE BUILDING. AN AVERAGE OF 100 PEOPLE ATTEND SERVICES HELD BY REV'D B. ANDERSON. CHURCH ORGANISATIONS IN WATER ORTON ARE BOYS BRIGADE/PATHFINDERS/MOTHERS UNION/PLAY GROUP/BROWNIES/YOUTH CLUBS/LADIES CLUB.
